abstract member OnTune : Android.Net.Uri * Android.OS.Bundle -> bool override this.OnTune : Android.Net.Uri * Android.OS.Bundle -> bool

Docs.param: Domain-specific data for this tune request. Keys must be a scoped name, i.e. prefixed with a package name you own, so that different developers will not create conflicting keys.
Docs.summary: Tunes to a given channel.
Docs.returns: true if the tuning was successful, false otherwise.
